div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 07:56 am CDT

div.span: A slight chance of sprinkles between 11am and 4pm. Cloudy, then gradually becoming mostly sunny, with a high near 64. Breezy, with a north northwest wind around 25 mph, with gusts as high as 40 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 40. North northwest wind 10 to 15 mph decreasing to 5 to 10 mph in the evening. Winds could gust as high as 25 mph.
Sunny, with a high near 75. Light and variable wind becoming south 5 to 10 mph in the afternoon.

div.h4: Pickup Changed To North Kitchen Door at the Elementary Starting April 15!
div.p: O sceola Public Sc hool continues offering free breakfast and lunch for ages 1 to 18 in the Osceola District. A big thank you to B|D Construction for blocking off the construction area and making our kitchen at the elementary available again. This will allow us to serve the meals directly from the kitchen at the elementary. Beginning on Wednesday April 15th, we ask that you enter the north entrance of . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Free Grab n' Go Meals!

div.p:
March 9th - March 13th
Puppy Paws
Doors unlock @ 7:45AM
Breakfast is served from 7:45AM - 8:05AM
Please call the office before 8:00AM if your child will be late, absent, or leaving early.
Please remember to send a coat, hat and gloves with
your child to school.
Parents please send snow pants, boots, gloves, and coats with your child to school. The kids are
loving playing in the snow and when . . .
